column5: Okay, I'm trying to figure out how to upload some pictures to a post I have made. Looked in help and the info on THE GALLERY but I can't even find that. Some help please.  Bill
do you have a photobucket account?  if not, make one and it's free.  then you just copy and paste the image [ img ] code in to your report.

the easy way is to do it is photobucket.com and set up the account the click upload and browse to where the picture/pictures are on your computer click on the photos you want and click ok  once uploaded you copy the direct link below the photo on photobucket and put it in the image link in your post on OFC and it will appear in your post when you click on preview
wich link code do we use for this site? email direct html img ?  first time trying photobucket as well

if you click img it will show you 'copied' so now you just paste here.  [ IMG]http:  //i345.photobucket.com/albums/p387/G_B_W/Caribe/100_3040.jpg[/img ]  just remove the spaces that I used...  in img and after http:
Don't worry, I have to relearn that process every time I try.  As long as you use the same hand for holding the toilet paper every day, then you've got the big stuff covered.
so is there a limit to how many photos you put in a post when you use photobucket?  is this how people post 20 pic reports?

Your confussed Geoff. Put your cursor on the image you want.A bar will drop.Click on the img link (bottom one),Click on it,it will read  copied. Then you right click on this site/on your thread and paste. Nothing else required. Unless your pc operates dif.???   If you are doing a report with multibul pics,you will need to click auto break.
It says CLICK TO CONFIGURE POST OPTIONS. ITS UNDER OPTIONS

yup, well I do   I don't look at the full size img, I just look at the album and C&P from there.  Mike, yes this is how people add 10 to 15 pic's in a post.  Hum, I noticed my link before is messed a bit...  well I was rushing to catch a train home...
Now you know why I very seldom post pictures, use to be simple, upload to OFC insert link done.  I'm old enough now I don't lie about my age anymore, I brag about it!
Its one of the ways to do it, yes.
took me 6 months. all idiots at one time!
LMAO You should of seen me when Cory and Spiel were trying to tell me how to do it,when it was not so simple. DROVE ME FRIGG,N NUTZ.
